name: Tiny Knights (Rainbow Bears Studio)
description:
Tiny Knights is a PvP game where you battle using only one button!

Red uses the Tab Key.

Blu uses the Backspace Key

The moves you can do are:

One tap --> Attack

Hold --> Block with your shield

Release after holding --> Parry. If you time it right against an enemy attack you will stun them leaving them vulnerable to your attacks.

Double tap --> Kick. Is your enemy holding their shield like a turtle? Kick them and get them stunned so you can get to the offensive.

Attacking and blocking will drain stamina, with more stamina drained if you hit your enemy while they are blocking.

Whoever's HP reaches 0 loses.

Let the battle begin!

Design and Programming: Simón García Barea

Art: Marina Munárriz Berdión

Music by Strobotone
